Message.Title: Ebay's Search Is The End Of Ebay
Message.Msg: What is wrong with these people - the inability to search for items on Ebay will be their doom. What happened to the old saying "if ain't broke - don't fix it". For those that don't routinely use Ebay, they have now changed the search capability is that is almost impossible to find items for sale/auction. It is now basically a very crud exact word match search. You literally have to search for "dog" and "dogs"
